mapper.sql: item_id, item_desc, item_qty, order_gift_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into order_gift_item_list( item_desc, item_qty, order_gift_id, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{itemDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemQty, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderGiftId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update order_gift_item_list set
item_desc = #{itemDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_qty = #{itemQty, jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_gift_id = #{orderGiftId, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where item_id = #{itemId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
